column3: Traffic;Kampong Speu: A foreign national was arrested after causing a traffic accidents in Kampong Speu province.------The crash occurred in Trapeang Russey
column8: an RX300 was driven by BAEK JEONGWOON
column10: a Korean national who runs a Christian church in Sambor Commune
column12: Kampong Speu Province.------The Lexus hit a motorbike
column14: causing serious injuries.------The police arrested the Korean and sent him to the police station in Samrang Tong district for futher legal action.------Source: General Department of Immigration
